Nightlight:

"Burning Hammer?"she said when she saw him, he looked diferent but 
why she had that bad feeling? that something was wrong?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer stepped out of the CR Chamber. He smiles quite 
evilly and laughs. He looks around the base until he finds 
Nightlight. He gasps when he sees Zeni.
> 
> Burning Hammer: Such an easy little target.
> 
> Ignoring Nightlight completely, he walked right up to her and drew 
his pistol, chuckling maniacally. Zeni gasps and Burning Hammer 
becomes frightened. He drops the gun and runs, still not even knowing 
that Nightlight was standing there...
